trustfund:
TF021083-ITALY - BHZ-EDUCATION
            RECONSTRUCTION PROJECT II,TF020873-RECONSTRUCTION PROGRAM
            PREPARATION (BANK EX.)

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Emergency
            Education Reconstruction Project for Bosnia and Herzegovina
            are to improve primary education access and quality by
            reconstructing primary schools throughout Bosnia and
            Herzegovina. The project's overall outcome is rated
            satisfactory. Key lessons learned from this project are: 1)
            Rapid reconstruction has medium term cost in terms of
            delayed policy and institutional reform. 2) Better
            communication and coordination among donors and different
            levels of government is essential within the Federation and
            between entities. 3) Reconstruction in many areas cannot
            proceed effectively without progress in addressing key
            policy issues in the sector. 4) It will take time before
            parties to the conflict accept the role education must play
            in promoting reconciliation.
